Package com.bankapp.models

Class Card

java.lang.Object
com.bankapp.models.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Card extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a card within the bank application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int number, Date validTo, boolean isActivated, int pinCode, Account account, int CVV, int maxWithdraw)
      Constructs a new Card with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      number - the card number
      validTo - the expiration date of the card
      isActivated - whether the card is activated
      pinCode - the PIN code of the card
      account - the account associated with the card
      CVV - the CVV code of the card
      maxWithdraw - the maximum withdrawal limit of the card
